name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹含碳化合物的命名、結構與性質的基本概念。課程重點在反應機構、合成、立體化學、化學分析及儀器分析方法。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	Content
1	9/15, 9/18   	Chapter 1 Introduction; Chapter 3 Acids and Bases
2	9/22, 9/25	        Chapter 3 Acids and Bases
3	9/29, 10/2	        Chapter 4 Nomenclature and Conformations of Alkanes and  
                                               Cycloalkanes
4	10/6, 10/9	        Chapter 5 Stereochemistry, Holiday (10/9)
5	10/13, 10/16	Chapter 6 Ionic Reactions
6	10/20, 10/23	Chapter 7 Alkenes and Alkynes I
7	10/27,               Exam I (Chapter 3-6)
        10/30	        Chapter 7 Alkenes and Alkynes I
8	11/3, 11/6	        Chapter 8 Alkenes and Alkynes II
9	11/10, 11/13	Chapter 8 Alkenes and Alkynes II
10	11/17, 11/20	Chapter 9 Nuclear Magnetic Resonance and Mass Spectrometry
11	11/24, 11/27	Exam II (Chapter 7-9), No Classes (11/27)
12	12/1, 12/4	        Chapter 10 Radical Reactions
13	12/8, 12/11	Chapter 11 Alcohols and ether
14	12/15, 12/18	Chapter 11 Alcohols and ether
15	12/22, 12/25	Chapter 12 Alcohols from Carbonyl Compounds
16	12/29, 1/1	        Chapter 12 Alcohols from Carbonyl Compounds, No Classes (1/1)
17	1/4, 1/5	        Exam III (Chapter 10-12)
18	1/8
scorePolicy:
所有考試題目都是英文出題，可使用翻譯機或字典。
Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%); Attendance (10 %) 
及格分數為60分 
考試未出席且未請假，分數為0分計算。
考試請假只有1次機會且不補考，成績由其他2次考試分數平均計算。
materials: Graham Solomons, Craig Fryhle, Scott Snyder, Organic Chemistry, 11th Edition, 2014, John Wiley & Sons Singapore Pte/ Ltd
